node.title: Open Telemetry for ASP.NET Core
node.description: The basics of how to configure Open Telemetry metrics, logs, and traces for ASP.NET Core and export the traces.

node.title: Deep Dive into Open Telemetry for .NET
node.description: How to use the Open Telemetry specification, tools and SDK's used to instrument, generate, collect, and export telemetry data (metrics, logs, and traces) using .NET and ASP.NET.
